description: A tool that generates images using a model like `gpt-image-1`.

type.description: The type of the image generation tool. Always `image_generation`.

background.description:
Background type for the generated image. One of `transparent`, `opaque`, or
`auto`. Default: `auto`.

input_image_mask.description:
Optional mask for inpainting. Contains `image_url` (string, optional) and
`file_id` (string, optional).

file_id.description: File ID for the mask image.

model.description: The image generation model to use. Default: `gpt-image-1`.

moderation.description: Moderation level for the generated image. Default: `auto`.

output_compression.description: Compression level for the output image. Default: 100.

output_format.description:
The output format of the generated image. One of `png`, `webp`, or `jpeg`.
Default: `png`.

partial_images.description:
Number of partial images to generate in streaming mode, from 0 (default value)
to 3.

quality.description:
The quality of the generated image. One of `low`, `medium`, `high`, or `auto`.
Default: `auto`.

size.description:
The size of the generated image. One of `1024x1024`, `1024x1536`, `1536x1024`,
or `auto`. Default: `auto`.
